name: StressFreeNaturally-MeditationswithAshlie
0:
”Alexa, open Stress Free Naturally”
”clear my mind”
”help me sleep”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: stress free naturally
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Join Holistic Health Practitioner and All Around Life-Hacker, Ashlie Pappas for an oasis from your busy life. Enable this skill for a wide variety of meditations, suited to help you de-stress and thrive in all areas of your life.

You know who you are, you give your time to everyone... except yourself. 

You'll find peace of mind, less stress, and a new perspective – all in less time than it takes to pick the kids up from school!

HOW TO NAVIGATE THE STRESS-FREE NATURALLY SKILL:
Simply ask Alexa to open Stress-Free Naturally. Ashlie will walk you through the basics of how to select the meditation best for you.

You can say:
-Alexa, open Stress-Free Naturally
-Alexa, tell Stress-Free Naturally I'm ready for bed
-Alexa, tell Stress-Free Naturally to help me calm down
-Alexa, tell Stress-Free Naturally to clear my mind
-Alexa, tell Stress-Free Naturally to play a short meditation
-Alexa, tell Stress-Free Naturally I want to attract something amazing!
-Alexa, tell Stress-Free Naturally to play a fresh meditation

You can also skip forward or backward to a different episode, pause, resume, adjust volume, etc. 

FYI:
Just a heads up, these meditations include spiritual aspects but are not intended to be of a specific religious nature.

And as with any meditation... use common sense. Meditation is generally not something to multi-task. Especially refrain from listening to these meditations while driving or operating machinery.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
